name: Mubit
description: Mubit is a puzzle game that revolves around pressing buttons that correspond to the pathways and walls they make! So pressing a blue button would activate all Blue Pathways and Walls within that stage! The player controls a time robot called "Mubit" who is wandering the lands of this forgotten world, starting from islands and ending up to the old rythmic factory. This is the first game that was made by Stardusk, along with his friends Saby and Nerf. The game  was made in 1 week for Major Jam 3.
